channel.title: Um sorry about my last post i just need help really really bad
channel.description:
ok i want a server
i have no-ip/winzip.rar/scar divi/and multiple sources
i have a router though so idk what to do
i dont even know what to do for anything not even coding
ill take any coders they'll become co-owners the 1st 2 i guess ok i really need help plz

item.title: Um sorry about my last post i just need help really really bad
item.dc:creator: @hell0z hell0z
item.description:
@hell0z wrote:

i understand sir but u know on ur guide when u went to no-ip.com got an account and it had that red thing at the bottom like add things now mine doesnt have that it says

                   ""no hosts found on server, click here to make hosts" so im lost cause i dont want to skip the red step

[br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 01:36:45 PM[/size][hr]then it says that my account hasn’t been activated so im stuck should i make a new email and do it again?

Read full topic

item.title: Um sorry about my last post i just need help really really bad
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“hell0z, post:3, topic:138616”]alright that didn’t help much i really need some1 to take my through it step by step its a good post but im too new for that stuff sorry dude[/quote]If you don’t get that you shouldn’t make a server.
Making a server is not just 1,2,3.
It requires coding, if you don’t get that you wouldn’t get coding within 3 years
